candidates.why: Session-scoped command that runs CLI validations via Bash, parses outputs, and writes reports under .workflow/active/{session}/.process.
Shares the same session folder conventions and context-package inputs used to discover target files.
Defines the standard context-package contract and .process placement that this validation gate reads.
Uses the same workflow/test session patterns and integrates with downstream test/execute commands that should be gated.
Illustrates flag parsing and auto-mode patterns (--yes) and decision reporting patterns that can be reused for gate decisions.

selected.why: Best match for a deterministic, session-scoped CLI validation step that produces structured report artifacts.
